cause.description:
We must have a loyalty to our mother of mothers (EGYPT) if you are an Egyptian you must help your country to stand up again .
Let us say : We want our EGYPT come again .
1. Human rights violations by the government must stop immediately.
2. Call to save the Egyptian pound from falling .
3. Full equality among all members of society in different affiliations and orientations.
4. Improve education and health and increase their balance of the state budget.
5. Stop all forms of American intervention in Egypt's foreign policy and internal and stop American aid.
cause.name: Save Egypt
